subject: Football
lead_paragraph: The last time the Bills and the Lions both started their seasons with 3-0 records was 1980. And since 1990, more than three-fourths of teams that started 3-0 have made the playoffs.
snippet: The last time the Bills and the Lions both started their seasons with 3-0 records was 1980. And since 1990, more than three-fourths of teams that started 3-0 have made the playoffs.
